jobDescription: Who we are:  Incapsulate provides services from conception to delivery. We are a team of developers, designers, and analysts who are committed to helping businesses solve problems using state-of-the-art technology. We believe that the best results are achieved by people who are passionate about what they do and continually strive to be better - those are the people we hire.  FYI: Incapsulate was named by CIO Review as a Top 20 Salesforce Solution provider for 2017! Check us out on page 10.  Who We Are Looking For:  Incapsulate is searching for a Salesforce Developer to join our team of skilled and passionate individuals working on a variety of interesting and challenging projects.  Were looking for people who love Salesforce but also are interested in a variety of other technologies. Self-starters who want a fast-paced environment where they will learn something new everyday.  Responsibilities:  - Hands on design and development using the Force.com platform including significant work in Apex, VisualForce and application integration patterns.  - Designs and implements business technology solutions focused on cloud-based business applications, specifically, Salesforce.com.  - Advises on projects focused on Salesforce.com - Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and the Force.com platform.  - Some involvement with developing business requirements, specifications, process flows, application design, application configuration and testing, administration as necessary.  - Works directly with business partners to lead projects, facilitates business process analysis sessions, develops and delivers key components of technology solution.  - Take a leadership role when necessary to help advance and support our SalesForce Practice.  - Assist in training and mentoring of Jr. Developers and growing the current SalesForce team.  Required Skills:  - 4+ years experience with Salesforce.com.  - 3+ years as a Salesforce.com developer.  - Experience with Lightning Design System and creating components.  - Strong ability to implement applications across the Salesforce environments such as Force.com, Heroku, etc.  - 3+ years experience with technologies integral to Salesforce.com including: HTML/XHTML, jQuery, Javascript, AJAX, SQL, SOAP, REST, JSON, Apex, SOQL.  - 2+ years VisualForce and Sites page development.  - 2+ years understanding of data structures, data modeling and DB schema.  - Sound knowledge of Salesforce Integration Patterns.  - 2+ years Salesforce.com Communities, Partner/Customer Portal implementation is desired.  - 2+ years Data modeling using Force.com Platform standard and custom objects is desired.  - Salesforce Developer certification.  Education:  - Bachelors Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics or equivalent work experience.  What we bring to the table:  - Flexible, fun environment with tremendous growth potential, and the opportunity to make significant contributions.  - Innovative environment that encourages learning and adoption of the latest tools and technologies.  - Freedom to explore and challenge yourself in a variety of ways.  - Competitive compensation package.  - 100% Company paid benefits (health, dental, vision, life insurance) for all employees.  - Monthly and annual cell phone benefits.  Please connect with us on LinkedIn at: https://www.linkedin.com/company-beta/987663/  *Incapsulate is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender, identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.
